item.title: Ṛta
item.description: Realtime VR Fractal Sandbox Ṛta is the principle of natural order which regulates and coordinates the operation of the universe and everything within it. In the hymns of the Vedas, Ṛta is described as that which is ultimately responsible for the proper functioning of the natural, moral and sacrificial orders. Free VR Fractal Visualizer & Manipulation Software for Vive I am excited to share the next version of the FORM fractal visualizer, using a new compute shader surface calculation and rendering architecture.

item.title: AKTUAL
item.description: ASH KOOSHA show in TheWaveVR Event in TheWaveVR 8.16.17 Trailer Fan Video LiveStream I worked on some shaders, particles systems, animation, and art direction with strangeloop studios and aaron lemke Basically, took these dope videos by Hirad Sab (in the form of blender files) and made similar effects run realtime in Unity Press Techcrunch FACTMag VRFocus [Jump Into The Light](https://jumpintothelight.com/2017/08/16/experience-the-fourth-flagship-wave-aktual-featuring-ash-koosha-and-the-wav e-vr/) VRREporter

item.title: GRIMECRAFT viz

item.title: FORM 0.0 beta
item.description: Free VR Fractal Visualizer & Manipulation Software for Vive Have you ever wanted to fly around in fractals in 3D in VR??? NOW YOU CAN FORM is a VR Fractal Visualizer, controller, and 3D manipulation Download Binary (15MB) I haven’t had time ot do all the features I wanted, so I decided to release it in its half baked state. “this is beta software” i’d love for anyone who has any feedback to email me: nshelton at gmail dot com
